title: Elegant Botswana Resort & Casino near Gaborone Nature Reserve
description: Wildlife lovers rejoice with a stay at the Avani Gaborone Resort & Casino, located only a five-minute drive from the Gaborone Nature Reserve. Located in Botswana's capital city, you'll be conveniently placed to head into the city rich in history, before returning to the resort to relax by the sparkling pool. Put on your finest clothes and head to the casino, then take your pick of the onsite dining options, offering authentic African cuisine, juicy steaks, or simply sip on a cocktail at the pool bar.
